posts.post_content: @littlebeast: well said. a wide variety of quirky styles, from anson maddocks to phil and kaja foglio, made so many of the early cards memorable. unfortunately, as well as having to believe that planewalkers can be summoned for mana, wizards also no longer trusts us to appreciate anything that requires a bit of imagination.
posts.html:
